title: Frostbound Throne: Song of Night
description: Vale was born in battle seven hundred years ago, and in all this time, he's never encountered an enemy that poses a real challenge. Until now.Devi has been told terrifying tales of vengeful gods since her youth. She never thought that she would wake up in a world where she had to fight them.They're opposites, he gets on her nerves, she is under his skin, and if they're to survive, they must join forces.Disclaimer: Frostbound Throne is a trilogy.Book one: Song of Night.Book two: Song of Winter (October 2018)Book three: Song of Heaven and Ice TBDEach book is novel length.If you dislike cliffhangers, all three books will be available in one volume in 2019.Court of Sin is a series of adult fantasy novels unsuitable for clean readers.
author: May Sage
